Sending Done Create Album Change Album Add Other Email %1$s Photos %1$s Videos %1$s Audios %1$s Others Premium features What is trash ? It\'s temporary storage for stuffs you\'ve deleted. Everything in Trash still take up space on your device. UPGRADE TO RECOVER EMPTY TRASH Select All Refresh Restore Delete Previous data was found in your device. Would you like to restore them? Are you sure to delete all items? You can not undo this! These items will be restored! Restore Now
PIN was incorrect Forgot your pin? No problem. Here\'s how to reset it Lock your albums with individual passwords through each albums\'s menu. You can unlock them all at once here. Unlock all albums Enter the access code below. We\'ll unlock all of the albums on this device Step 1: Step 2: Request an account code. We\'ll send it to your primary email address: %1$s Enter the access code below. We\'ll begin the reset process so you can create a new PIN Access code Reset PIN Premium feature Premium Whenever someone enters an incorrect PIN, We will log the date time and snap a secret photo Disabled Set custom cover Enabled Create a second PIN or pattern that opens to a decoy SuperSafe Disguise SuperSafe as a different app. Simply press and hold on the Supersafe logo to bring up the lock screen. Recent alerts Create Fake PIN Change Fake PIN

SuperSafe will look like a different app when you open it. All you need to do is find and long-press the SuperSafe logo to reveal the PIN pad. 100 % System scan complete 0 threats detected status: OK Secret Door App Virus scanner Sync Completed MONTHLY USAGE Updated %1$s Left %1$s 100 quota will be available next month REMOVE QUOTA LIMIT SuperSafe Used Space Other Used Space Free Space Pause Cloud Sync Cloud Sync Only In Wifi Calculating SuperSafe Premium You have %1$s days of complimentary Premium remaining Your premium was expired Move %1$s items to trash? FAQ Support
I have a new phone file:///android_asset/new_phone.html
How do I export my files? file:///android_asset/export_files.html
How do I recover files from Trash? file:///android_asset/recover_files.html
I forgot the Password How to unlock my albums file:///android_asset/unlock_albums.html
What\'s the fake PIN and how do i use it? file:///android_asset/fake_pin.html
Contact support Contact support From How We can help you Enter previous PIN to restore You thank for sending the info. We will response as soon as possible. Sending email was failed. Please try again. Your premium expires soon You have %1$s more days of complimentary Premium remaining. Upgrade now to keep using Premium without interruption. You have %1$s more days of complimentary Premium remaining. Monthly per month per year MOST POPULAR Yearly Lifetime Use every feature It\'s top-shelf SuperSafe Never lost files Trash recovery Get deleted items back. No advertisements Get rid of those ugly ads! What if I don\'t want Premium That\'s file. When your complimentary Premium expires, You can switch to Basic What\'s basic? It\'s the free version of SuperSafe. It still protect your important files and you still can upload file to Google Drive 100 files per month. All of them behind a lock screen and gives you good privacy features Default covers Album items Select an item from this album for the cover photo.(Or by using the most recent photos) Customize your theme. Tap here to add items Add photos, videos, audios, or create a new album. Tap here to enable sync data. The items will be synced to Google drive. You never lost files. Installed Learn more Did You discover our apps? Our apps https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=tpcreative.co.qrscanner.free.release tpcreative.co.qrscanner.free.release
